title: Brand New Luxury High Rise apartment in Downtown Dallas
posting_body: "Brand New Luxury High Rise apartment in Downtown Dallas
My services are absolutely FREE, don’t hesitate to give me a call for assistance
If you're interested in more information about this property, or would like to review other available options, call/text or email me.
We offer studios, 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments conveniently located in Bryan Place, walking distance to Deep Ellum, Arts District and Downtown Dallas.
Technology Lounge with Two Micro-Conference Rooms
Infinity Edge Pool with Outdoor Soft Seating and Lounges with Fantastic Views of Downtown and Uptown
Resident Lounge Accompanied with a Catering Kitchen, Fireplace, and TV’s
Covered Grilling Area with Outdoor TV and Fireplace
State of the Art Golfzon Golf Simulator
Full Fitness Club Featuring a Cell Phone Lounge and Yoga/TRX Studio
Tranquil Courtyard with Fire Pit, Pavilions & Lounges
Pet Friendly Community with Private Roof Top Dog Park and Spa*
** Pictures are NOT necessarily the unit advertised..
Rates, availability, and specials are subject to change.
To better assist you please provide us with the following:
Availability and pricing subject to change at any time.

Spectacular   apartment featuring rooftop pool perfectly located  enhanced by berber carpet  Bautiful Community  ,  Ice makers   Valet Trash Service   Leisure lounge complete with resident kitchen  Access to upscale dining, shopping & entertainment     pool and spa   Surrounded by Dallas entertainment   Dishwasher  Gated garage parking with controlled access  Walk-in showers,   Outdoor Grills
